name: Flashbang Grenade
description: An explosive grenade that disorients the enemies it damages.

name: Lift
description: Jump and then press again while in the air to activate Lift.

name: Fist of Havoc
description: Smash the ground and dissolve nearby enemies in a maelstrom of Arc Light.

name: Storm Fist
description: A punishing melee attack that deals bonus damage.

name: Titan Codex I
description: Training focused on battle recovery and toughness.

name: Headstrong
description: Sprinting increases the leap distance of Fist of Havoc.

name: Titan Codex IV
description: Training focused on all attributes.

name: Unstoppable
description: You are harder to kill while using Fist of Havoc.

name: Pulse Grenade
description: A grenade that periodically damages enemies inside its explosion radius.

name: Increased Height
description: Upgrades Lift to travel to greater heights.

name: Aftermath
description: Fist of Havoc leaves a damage-dealing field in its wake.

name: Overload
description: Hits with Storm Fist have a chance to immediately reset its cooldown.

name: Titan Codex II
description: Training focused on speed and toughness.

name: Aftershocks
description: Increases the duration of Pulse Grenade, Lightning Grenade, and Aftermath.

name: Titan Codex V
description: Training focused on maximum battle recovery.

name: Shoulder Charge
description: After sprinting for a short time, press to unleash a devastating melee attack.

name: Lightning Grenade
description: A grenade that sticks to any surface, periodically emitting bolts of lightning.

name: Increased Control
description: Upgrades Lift for better directional control while in the air.

name: Death from Above
description: After jumping, Fist of Havoc can be aimed at enemies below.

name: Discharge
description: Hits with Storm Fist have a chance to deal area of effect damage around the target.

name: Titan Codex III
description: Training focused on battle recovery and speed.

name: Transfusion
description: Kills with Storm Fist immediately trigger health regeneration.

name: Titan Codex VI
description: Training focused on raw speed.

name: Juggernaut
description: After sprinting for a short time, gain a protective shield.

name: Catapult
description: Upgrades Lift to provide a strong initial burst of momentum.

name: Shockwave
description: Fist of Havoc unleashes a wave of devastating energy which travels along the ground.

name: Amplify
description: Kills with Storm Fist significantly reduce the cooldown of Fist of Havoc.
